subject: CAD model for Simsonn Plus X
description_text:
Goodday,

Today I purchased a set of Simsonn Plux X pedals for my new sim-rig I'm
planning.
Would it be possible to get some (simplified) cad/step models for
planning purposes?

With kind regards
Kevin van Weerdenburg

conversations.body_text: Hi Kevin van Weerdenburg,  Models are usually considered confidential information. Please let me know what kind of design you need to work on, and I can provide some suggestions based on your requirements.Â
